description.value:
You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy that manifests as a @Template[line|distance:30] or a @Template[cone|distance:15], dealing @Damage[ceil(@actor.level/2)d4[@actor.flags.pf2e.draconicExemplar.damageType]|traits:area-damage] damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You can't use this ability again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4. The shape of the breath, the damage type, and the saving throw match those of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Draconic Exemplar]. This ability has the trait associated with the type of damage it deals.

@Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic]
